project.name: debian docker systemd base image
project.description: Debian buster base includeing systemd. Several systemd related files are removed, so that it does not try to mount /.

finetuning.command: cd /lib/systemd/system/sysinit.target.wants/ && ls | grep -v systemd-tmpfiles-setup.service | xargs rm -f
finetuning.file:
[Unit] Description=Set /dev/kvm group to kvm Requires=local-fs.target Documentation=man:chgrp(1)
[Service] Type=oneshot ExecStart=/bin/chgrp kvm /dev/kvm
[Install] WantedBy=sysinit.target
